item.title: Acrobat Boots
item.fluff: These enchanted boots enhance your acrobatic skills

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou stand up from prone.

item.title: Boots of Adept Charging
item.fluff: Rushing in is less dangerous in these studded leather boots

block.name: Property
block.line: After resolving a charge attack, you can shift 1 square.

item.title: Boots of Agility
item.fluff: These tight-fitting boots make your feet tingle with magic
item.headline: Item BonusAcrobatics checks, Stealth checks, and Dexterity ability checks

item.title: Boots of the Dryad
item.fluff: Natural growth moves aside as you travel the wilderness, and you can disappear only to step out from a nearby tree

block.name: Forest Walk
block.line: You ignore difficult terrain that is the result of plants, trees, underbrush, or other natural growth.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou teleport up to 4 squares to a space adjacent to a tree, a plant creature, or similar vegetation. The plant must be of your size or larger.
Level 15Teleport up to 7 squares.
Level 25Teleport up to 10 squares.

item.title: Boots of Jaunting
item.fluff: These comfortable leather boots allow you to slip past obstacles unhindered

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou teleport 1 square.

item.title: Boots of Rapid Motion
item.fluff: With these polished leather boots, you are hard to slow down

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn effect makes you slowed
EffectYou make a saving throw against the triggering effect, even if it does not normally end on a save.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a +1 power bonus to speed until the end of the encounter.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Level 5The item does not have this power.
EffectYou move up to half your speed.
Level 25This power is an encounter power instead.

item.title: Boots of Spider Climbing
item.fluff: These enchanted boots improve your ability to climb

block.name: Property
block.line: You do not spend extra squares of movement when you make an Athletics check to climb.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your current turn, you have a climb speed equal to your speed.
You move up to your climb speed.
Level 15Until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Boots of Stealth
item.fluff: The soft leather soles and down lining of these supple boots quiet your footsteps

item.title: Catstep Boots
item.fluff: These enchanted boots reduce falling damage and enhance your acrobatic and athletic skills

block.name: Property
block.line: You always land on your feet.
When you fall or jump down, you treat a fall of 40ft or less as being half the distance, and reduce a fall of more than 40ft as 20ft shorter.
Level 13100ft or less, or 50ft shorter
Level 23200ft or less, or 100ft shorter

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a +2 power bonus to your next Acrobatics or Athletics check. You must make the check before the end of the encounter.
Level 13+4 power bonus
Level 23+6 power bonus

item.title: Feyleaf Sandals
item.fluff: This delicate footgear incorporates Feywild leaves into its design

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou start to fall
EffectYou teleport safely to the nearest horizontal surface within 5 squares that can supoort your weight.
You take no falling damage, and land on your feet.

item.title: Fleetrunner Boots
item.fluff: The owner of these boots is gifted with unprecedented mobility in combat

block.name: Property
block.line: Running only gives you a -2 penalty to attack rolls.
Level 15When you run, you can move up to your speed + 4, instead of speed + 2.
Level 25When you run, you can move up to your speed + 4, and only grant combat advantage for the first attack made against you before the start of your next turn.

item.title: Jester Shoes
item.fluff: These colourful, pointed shoes help you stand out -but not stand up- in a crowd

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are pushed, pulled, or slid
EffectReduce the distance of the pull, push or slide by 1 square.
Level 12by 2 squares
Level 22by 4 squares
If the forced movement was not reduced to 0, you fall prone after the triggering effect has been resolved.

item.title: Panther Slippers
item.fluff: These soft, clawed shoes help you stay within striking range of prey

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy adjacent to you shifts
EffectYou shift 1 square.
If you are in Beast Form, you can instead shift up to 3 squares.
Level 25This power is an encounter power instead

item.title: Riding Boots
item.fluff: These stylish knee-high boots let you look good while they spur your steed

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are riding a Mount, that Mount gains a +1 item bonus to speed.

item.title: Silt Sandals
item.fluff: Dust and stains fall away from the surface and the tread of these simple clogs

block.name: Property
block.line: These sandals have the following properties:
You ignore difficult terrain resulting from dirt, sand, or silt.
The DC to find or follow tracks you leave in dirt, sand, or silt increases by +4.
Level 15Increases by +8.
Level 25You leave no tracks in dirt, sand, or silt.

If you start a movement on a solid surface, you can move across non-solid surface (such as silt or water) as if it were solid ground. If you are still on a non-solid surface at the end of the movement, you fall in.

Level 15If you begin your turn on a solid surface, you can both move across a non-solid surface and stand of it as if it solid ground. If you are still on a non-solid surface at the end of your turn, you fall in.
Level 25You can both walk across a non-solid surface and stand on it as if it were solid ground.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of the encounter, you can both walk across a non-solid surface (such as silt or water) and stand on it as if it were solid ground.
Level 25You ignore difficult terrain from moving non-solid surfaces, and can reduce any forced movement caused by the surface by 3 squares.

item.title: Spiked Soles
item.fluff: These sole plates sprout tiny spikes, which aid in climbing and in keeping your footing

block.name: Property
block.line: You you gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks to climb when you can use your feet.
level 15+6 item bonus.
Level 25+10 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are pushed, pulled, or slid
EffectYou negate the triggering forced movement.
You are slowed until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Surefoot Boots
item.fluff: Attached snuggly by rows of shiny buckles, these boots help keep your footing
item.headline: Item BonusAcrobatics checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are knocked prone
EffectYou stand up from prone.

item.title: Swiftpad Boots
item.fluff: These supple boots lend a lion's strength to your leaps

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks to jump.
Level 13+6 item bonus.
Level 23+10 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou make a long jump, and clear a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.
Level 23Equal to 1 + your Strength modifier.
If you are trained in Athletics, you clear 1 additional square.

item.title: Wavestrider Boots
item.fluff: These enchanted boots allow you to walk across liquid as if it were solid ground

block.name: Property
block.line: If you start a movement on a solid surface, you can move across liquid as if it were solid ground. If you are still on liquid at the end of the movement, you fall in.
Level 14If you begin your turn on a solid surface, you can both move across liquid and stand of it as if it solid ground. If you are still on liquid at the end of your turn, you fall in.
Level 24You can both walk across liquid and stand on it as if it were solid ground.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of the encounter, you can both walk across liquid and stand on it as if it were solid ground.
Level 24You ignore difficult terrain from moving liquids, and can reduce any forced movement caused by the liquid by 3 squares.

item.title: Wildrunners
item.fluff: Crafted from the hides of wild animals, these boots lend you extraordinary speed

block.name: Property
block.line: Wnen you run, you move up to your speed + 4, instead of speed + 2.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou run
EffectYou do not grant combat advantage for running.
Level 14This power is an encounter power instead.
